title: Heroku For Hosting
text:
Heroku For Hosting

Create a new app and link it to the repository
Add the custom buildpack to the app for fetching the files from the Github sub-modules as well:

Use heroku CLI in terminals to add the buildpack:
Use heroku login to login to the heroku account
Check the current buildpacks using heroku buildpacks -a <app-name>
Add the custom buildpack for fetching submodules using heroku buildpacks:add https://github.com/dmathieu/heroku-buildpack-submodules -a <app-name>
Redeploy the app

title: CESTA Student Data
text:
Project Member

            Eyup Eren Yurek
          
          
            Programs and Research Coordinator at CESTA
          
          
        
          
        
        
        Eren has developed the project further from the previous center managers’ works, as well as staff and scholars associated with the Humanities + Design Lab at CESTA. This project wouldn’t be possible without the heavy contributions of Sera Wang, the Undergraduate Researcher for CESTA Design.

title: CESTA Student Data
text:
Visualization
  
  Interactive Plotly Chart
  The visualization below is made in Flourish–a tool for data visualizations. it shows each Digital Humanities Research Fellow’s fellowship year and their department. Each line represents one fellow.
